ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
ygData.msgSnippet: Does the Warden spawn up on top of the platform in the jail room? I ve never seen him either ;-P -Faras
ygData.messageBody:
Does the Warden spawn up on top of the platform in the jail room?

I've never seen him either ;-P

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 2:24 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
>
>
> Matt,
>
> Just use your invis song to get to the warden. There's nothing worth
> fighting between the scryer room and him.
> Sneak down and have fun in the warden room. A good group
> of 25ish level
> can have a lot of fun there. I solo'd him at 30th.
>
> Good luck!
>
> Lyrnia
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Papa Legba" <legba@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Tuesday, April 11, 2000 3:17 PM
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Lambent woes....
>
>
> > We weren't strong enough to make it to the warden, we tried
> twice with
> > fairly lehtal results. (The first involved fighting 8 blue
> froggies, a
> > battle we should have won but the bard panicked and called
> Run). The
> > squire is alaways camped on Veeshan (at least he has been
> every time I
> > looked). We could have camped him after waiting a while,
> but then we
> > would have lost the sryer camp (they aren't very close).
> OUr plan is to
> > try for squire this week.
> > --
> > We now return to the non-stop rock.
> >
> > Matt DeBarger
